title: 12 Women Die, Dozens Hospitalized After Sterilization Procedures In India
teaser: Since the 1960s, sterilization has been a prevalent method of contraception for women in India. Renee Montagne talks to Annie Gowen of The Washington Post about the recent botched sterilizations
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
